title: V-Model
subject: Software Engineering
theory:
Verification & Validation model. 
Execution of process happens in sequential V-shape. 
For every development phase, there is a corresponding testing phase (e.g., Requirements <-> Acceptance Test).

interview_questions.question: Difference between Verification and Validation?
interview_questions.answer: Verification: Are we building the product right? (Static). Validation: Are we building the right product? (Dynamic).

real_world_use_cases.description: Critical systems need rigorous testing at every level (Unit, Integration, System).
